svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 348px; height: 1px; padding-top: 33px; margin-left: 23px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Arial; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: Arial; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 348px; height: 1px; padding-top: 72px; margin-left: 132px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Consolas; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: ... A G C G T A C C G A T A C G T A ...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 181px; margin-left: 212px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: Arial; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 48px; height: 1px; padding-top: 214px; margin-left: 33px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #2ca02c;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Arial; color: #2ca02c; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 438px; height: 1px; padding-top: 249px; margin-left: 33px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: Arial; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
1. Identify positions where humans differ from ancestral state (human-derived alleles)
2. Select variants at high frequency in modern populations (AF > 95%)
3. These alleles survived selection for millions of years → presumed neutral/tolerated
4. Result: ~14 million training examples labeled as proxy-neutral

switch.text: 1. Identify positions where humans differ from ancestral state (human-derived alleles)...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 53px; height: 1px; padding-top: 309px; margin-left: 33px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #d6b656;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Arial; color: #d6b656; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 438px; height: 1px; padding-top: 331px; margin-left: 33px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: Arial; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• Some derived alleles may be pathogenic (incomplete penetrance, late-onset disease)
• Proxy-neutral ≠ confirmed neutral — this is an approximation for training

switch.text: • Some derived alleles may be pathogenic (incomplete penetrance, late-onset disease)...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 380px; margin-left: 27px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Arial; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
